name: Ed Giobbi's Whole-Lamb Barbecue
keywords: garlic, herbs, lamb, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: Select a whole lamb weighing about 25 pounds, dressed, ready-tocook weight
1/2 cup chopped fresh or dried rosemary
1/4 cup chopped fresh or dried rosemary leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Put three cups of the vinegar, the chopped garlic, rosemary and pepper into the container of a food processor or electric blender. Blend well.
Add the remaining vinegar and blend as thoroughly as possible.
